Module nattraverso.pynupnp.upnpxml

This module parse an UPnP device's XML definition in an Object.

Version: 0.1.0

Author: Raphael Slinckx

Contact: raphael@slinckx.net

Copyright: Copyright 2005

License: LGPL

Classes
UPnPXml This objects parses the XML definition, and stores the useful results in attributes.
